title: Attachements to email not being saved in nominated location within Settings
content: Recently files attached to emails are not being saved in the Folder nominated within Firefox Settings and appear to be going into a Download Folder. The attachments will display in the correct manner when Open is selected but when the Save option is selected up until recently they have gone to the folder designated in Settings. I can not rectify this. Help would be appreciated. Thank you.
creator: GrahamRichings

title: Firefox 95.0.2 tabs
content: I'm using OS Monterey 12.0.1, Firefox 95.0.2. How do I keep the tabs locked in the Firefox browser window? They continue to disappear into the top of the browser and take 5-10 hovers to make them visible.
creator: hbcato
